|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q16JVSIQ; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = NAND |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W29N01HVSINF; |flash2size = 128 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Broadcom]] BCM53547 40 Gb/s Multilayer Switch :Controller with Integrated ARM Cortex-A9 CPU *Flash/RAM: 2MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 128MB NAND Flash, 512MB RAM (DDR3) *24x Gigabit Ethernet ports *2x Gigabit SFP Slots
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:GS324T productcarousel 2 tcm148-100616.png File:GS324T productcarousel 3 tcm148-100704.png </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Netgear GS324T Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Netgear GS324T Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Netgear GS324T Flash Top.jpeg|Flash Board Top File:Netgear GS324T Flash Bottom.jpeg|Flash Board Bottom File:Netgear GS324T Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
